messages.content: I would love a game with either of these two!!! 2nd choice being Caracalla!
Falcons fan here. I love you guys so much.
I live downtown and walk around at odd hours of the night all the time. Love the empty and abandoned feel of the city.
I love how you only see these types of comments on Japanese games, brings out the inner weep.
I love how serious and mad cats get when the dog starts messing around with them all playful
PS. I love my aunt! She’s one of the reasons I went into “nursins.”
I didn't know of [NAME] before I saw that episode. I fucking love that man and have watched an unhealthy amount of him since.

My dad loves playing sport......the sport of slam dunking my arse for a touchdown
OMG she reminds me of Ginger from Ginger Snaps! I'm in love!

This is why I love politics. It really shows how stupid people are.
